description: The Celestial Sprite is a small, radiant creature with a mischievous glint in its eyes. Though it is a being of pure light and good intentions, its chaotic nature often leads to unintended consequences. With a heart full of compassion, it tries to aid those in need but often misinterprets situations, causing more harm than good. Despite this, the Celestial Sprite remains a beloved and mysterious figure in folklore, known for its spontaneous acts of kindness and mischief.

traits.name: Mischievous Light
traits.description: The Celestial Sprite emits a bright light that can blind or confuse those nearby. Creatures within 10 feet of the sprite must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn.

traits.name: Chaotic Kindness
traits.description: The Celestial Sprite can cast the spell 'Cure Wounds' at 2nd level, but the target must make a DC 13 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the healing is doubled, but the target also becomes Frightened for 1 minute.

actions.name: Radiant Bolt
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) radiant damage.

actions.name: Chaotic Smite
actions.description: The Celestial Sprite charges a target within 5 feet with radiant energy. The target takes 7 (1d8 + 3) radiant damage, and must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet and knocked prone.
